H0.text: how many winnie the pooh books are there. Three

H1.text: how many winnie the pooh books are there. Six

H2.text: how many winnie the pooh books are there. Two

H3.text: how many winnie the pooh books are there. four

A4.text: The first collection of stories about the character is the book Winnie-the-Pooh (1926), and this was followed by The House at Pooh Corner (1928).

A5.text: Winnie-the-Pooh (1926), The House at Pooh Corner (1928), Now We Are Six (1927), and When We Are Very Young (1924) are the four books illustrated by E. H. Shepard.

A6.text: Works by A. A. Milne at BiblioWiki (Canada) includes the complete text of the four Pooh books

A7.text: The House at Pooh Corner is the final novel by A. A. Milne to feature Winnie-the-Pooh and his world.
